LanguageData.RS.SeparateGeneDesc: Select a genepack from which to separate a gene from.
LanguageData.RS.SelectGeneExplanation: The selected gene will be separated from the rest of the gene pack.
LanguageData.RS.SeparateGeneExplanation: After successful separation two genepacks will be spawned. One only with the selected gene, the other one with the rest. This process is not perfect and there is a small chance of one of the gene packs being destroyed.
LanguageData.RS.FinishedSeparatingDestroyedMessage: Gene centrifuge finished separating genepacks! {0} was destroyed during the process.
LanguageData.RS.DuplicateXenogermDesc: Select a xenogerm to duplicate. Xenogerms with archite genes require archite capsules to be loaded.
LanguageData.RS.NotEnoughArchiteCapsulesLoaded: Do you really want to duplicate the xenogerm? Not enough archite capsules are loaded to duplicate all any archite genes inside the xenogerm.
LanguageData.RS.InfuseDarkArchiteWarningDesc: Infusing a void spike will put {PAWN_nameDef} in a coma as the spike's gene integrates itself. On average, this lasts for {COMADURATION}.
LanguageData.RS.InfuseDarkArchiteWarningNewMetabolism: After infusion, {PAWN_nameDef} will have a metabolism value of {MET} and a food consumption multiplier of {CONSUMPTION}.
LanguageData.RS.LetterDarkArchiteOrderedInfused: You have ordered a void spike to be infused into {PAWN_nameDef}. This procedure requires a medical bed.\n\nYou can cancel this procedure by going to {PAWN_nameDef}'s health -> operations tab.
LanguageData.RS.InfuseDarkArchiteDesc: Infuse this into a person to introduce a dark archite gene into their genetic code.\n\nThis is a surgical operation, so it requires a doctor and medical bed.
LanguageData.RS.CancelInfusingDesc: Cancel infusing this void spike into {PAWN_nameDef}.
LanguageData.RS.MessageCannotInfuseInTempFactionMembe: Cannot infuse in temporary faction members.
LanguageData.RS.TargetMustHaveAtLeastOneDarkGene: Target must have at least one dark archite gene.
